00020 #include <sstream>
00021 
00022 #include "rimagepointc8.h"
00023 
00024 namespace RDK2 { namespace RGraphics {
00025     
00026     RDK2_FACTORY(RImagePointC8);
00027         
00028     using namespace std;
00029     
00030     void RImagePointC8::write(Writer* w) const throw (WritingException)
00031     {
00032         w->startWriting(getClassName());
00033             w->write_i32(x);
00034             w->write_i32(y);
00035             w->write_i8(color);
00036         w->doneWriting();
00037     }
00038     
00039     void RImagePointC8::read(Reader* r) throw (ReadingException)
00040     {
00041         r->startReading(getClassName());
00042             x = r->read_i32();
00043             y = r->read_i32();
00044             color = (RImage::C8Color) r->read_i8();
00045         r->doneReading();
00046     }
00047     
00048     RDK2::Object* RImagePointC8::clone() const
00049     {
00050         return new RImagePointC8(*this);
00051     }
00052 
00053 }} // namespace
